briefdescription.para: Internal Detour crowd object.
NavigationMesh for which the crowd was created.
The NavigationMesh component Id for pending crowd creation.
The maximum number of agents the crowd can manage.
The maximum radius of any agent that will be added to the crowd.
Number of query filter types configured in the crowd. Limit to DT_CROWD_MAX_QUERY_FILTER_TYPE.
Number of configured area in each filter type. Limit to DT_MAX_AREAS.
Number of obstacle avoidance types configured in the crowd. Limit to DT_CROWD_MAX_OBSTAVOIDANCE_PARAMS.
Construct.
Destruct.
Apply attribute changes that can not be applied immediately. Called after scene load or a network update.
Draw the agents' pathing debug data.
Add debug geometry to the debug renderer.
Set the crowd target position. The target position is set to all crowd agents found in the specified node. Defaulted to scene node.
Set the crowd move velocity. The move velocity is applied to all crowd agents found in the specified node. Defaulted to scene node.
Reset any crowd target for all crowd agents found in the specified node. Defaulted to scene node.

detaileddescription.para: Set the maximum number of agents. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set the maximum radius of any agent. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Assigns the navigation mesh for the crowd. BIND_AS_ALIAS_set_navMesh

briefdescription.para: Set all the query filter types configured in the crowd based on the corresponding attribute.
Set the include flags for the specified query filter type.
Set the exclude flags for the specified query filter type.
Set the cost of an area for the specified query filter type.
Set all the obstacle avoidance types configured in the crowd based on the corresponding attribute.
Set the params for the specified obstacle avoidance type.
Get all the crowd agent components in the specified node hierarchy. If the node is not specified then use scene node. When inCrowdFilter is set to true then only get agents that are in the crowd.
Find the nearest point on the navigation mesh to a given point using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vector3 &start, const Vector3 &end, int queryFilterType, int maxVisited=3)
memberdef.name: MoveAlongSurface

briefdescription.para: Try to move along the surface from one point to another using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type.

memberdef.argsstring: (PODVector< Vector3 > &dest, const Vector3 &start, const Vector3 &end, int queryFilterType)
memberdef.name: FindPath

briefdescription.para: Find a path between world space points using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type. Return non-empty list of points if successful.
Return a random point on the navigation mesh using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vector3 &center, float radius, int queryFilterType, dtPolyRef *randomRef=nullptr)
memberdef.name: GetRandomPointInCircle

briefdescription.para: Return a random point on the navigation mesh within a circle using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type. The circle radius is only a guideline and in practice the returned point may be further away.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vector3 &point, float radius, int queryFilterType, Vector3 *hitPos=nullptr, Vector3 *hitNormal=nullptr)
memberdef.name: GetDistanceToWall

briefdescription.para: Return distance to wall from a point using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type. Maximum search radius must be specified.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Vector3 &start, const Vector3 &end, int queryFilterType, Vector3 *hitNormal=nullptr)
memberdef.name: Raycast

briefdescription.para: Perform a walkability raycast on the navigation mesh between start and end using the crowd initialized query extent (based on maxAgentRadius) and the specified query filter type. Return the point where a wall was hit, or the end point if no walls.

detaileddescription.para: Get the maximum number of agents. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Get the maximum radius of any agent. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Get the Navigation mesh assigned to the crowd. BIND_AS_ALIAS_get_navMesh
Get the number of configured query filter types. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Get the number of configured area in the specified query filter type. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return all the filter types configured in the crowd as attribute.
Get the include flags for the specified query filter type.
Get the exclude flags for the specified query filter type.
Get the cost of an area for the specified query filter type.

detaileddescription.para: Get the number of configured obstacle avoidance types. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return all the obstacle avoidance types configured in the crowd as attribute.
Get the params for the specified obstacle avoidance type.

Create and initialized internal Detour crowd object. When it is a recreate, it preserves the configuration and attempts to re-add existing agents in the previous crowd back to the newly created crowd.
Create and adds an detour crowd agent, Agent's radius and height is set through the navigation mesh. Return -1 on error, agent ID on success.
Removes the detour crowd agent.
Handle scene being assigned.
Update the crowd simulation.
Get the detour crowd agent.
Get the detour query filter.
Get the internal detour crowd component.
Handle the scene subsystem update event.
Handle navigation mesh changed event. It can be navmesh being rebuilt or being removed from its node.
Handle component added in the scene to check for late addition of the navmesh.
Crowd manager scene component. Should be added only to the root scene node.
